verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--"bhāgavatārtha bujhite nā pāri
bhāgavatārtha śunite āmi nahi adhikārī

synonyms: prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied; bhāgavata-artha—the meaning of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; bujhite nā pāri—I cannot understand; bhāgavata-artha—the purport of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam; śunite—to hear; āmi nahi adhikārī—I am not the proper person.
translation: The Lord replied, "I do not understand the meaning of Śrīmad-Bhāgavatam. Indeed, I am not a suitable person to hear its meaning.
